dydid — dydid
text: Set specifications dynamic Difference--Differences analysis, report coefficients regressions, draw coefficients dynamic way.

title: dydid — dydid
code: dydid(   data = df,   dv = "y",   tpoint = "reform_timepoint",   step = 1,   eid = "state_id",   tid = "year_id",   span = c(-5, 5),   covar = NULL )

title: dydid — dydid
text: data data set object dv outcome variable interest tpoint variable data indicates time treatment takes place step unit time ID increments, e.g., 2 every two years eid ID individual entity tid ID time point span number periods treatment want take consideration. covar controls variables included

title: dydid — dydid
text: functions return following three objects: . "regs": Original results regressions using felm(). B. "results": data frame reporting coefficients 95 C. "plot": dynamic plot coefficients using ggplot2().
